extendedInfo.description: Did Dominoâs just launch an Android app? Oh Yes We Did! You can now order Dominoâs from your  Android phone. Itâs convenient, easy and fun! Use your phone to select from our Legend, Feast, and Artisan Pizzas. Canât decide?  Use our âBuild your Ownâ feature to make the pizza just the way you like it. Got a taste for something other than pizza?  Youâll love any of our chicken, pasta, sandwich, bread, or dessert options. Only with the Dominos app can you track your order from the moment you place it, into the oven, and know right when itâs ready for pick up or delivery.Â¡Pide Dominoâs en inglÃ©s o en espaÃ±ol! Nuestro app se configura automÃ¡ticamente con el idioma que has escogido para tu smartphone o tableta.FEATURES:The ability to order from almost any Dominoâs in the U.S. (Nearly 5,000 locations)Access to all the items on our national menu.Find coupons available for use at your selected store.The app will remember your most recent store and other useful information.We do not require you to login.In app credit or debit card payment.Use Dominoâs Tracker to follow your order from the âmake lineâ, into the oven, then out for delivery or ready for pickup! Designed and built in the USA.Requirements:The Dominoâs app is compatible with Android 2.1 and above. If you have questions or comments about this app we would love to read them. Please email androidsupport@dominos.comPrefer to use the desktop version? Please visit http://www.dominos.com

reviews.title: Pefect
reviews.comment: Good pizza...great app very easy to use. Better than pizza huts or any other pizza app
reviews.author: Rudy Sanchez

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Fast, easy, intuitive. All pizza delivery apps should aspire to be this good.
reviews.author: Benjamin Simon

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Very easy to use. Had no problems typing in information. Great for when you need to make quick orders!
reviews.author: Rachel Alerte

reviews.title: Awsome app and super fast
reviews.comment: Great pizza and easy to use app even faster delivery
reviews.author: Sean Vogel

reviews.title: Quick and easy
reviews.comment: This is the quickest way to order. Works wonderful on Note tablet and phone. Well done
reviews.author: Donnie Haskell

reviews.title: Good job
reviews.comment: Dominos is easily better than its competition. Also ordering online is far too easy. The app is just as good.
reviews.author: John Coughlin

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Easy to navigate. Order was easy to place and quick
reviews.author: Jake Woody

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Easy to use, fast, simple, user friendly..
reviews.author: jen jones

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: So far so good. Order was easy and fun. Could see all the options. Now just hope they get it to us in a speedy decent fashion and I\'ll be very impressed
reviews.author: Brandon Anderson

reviews.title: LG Optimus
reviews.comment: The app does everything I need and is laid out so I can easily navigate it. Would give it a 5 if it didn\'t always try to up-sell me every time
reviews.author: Paul Treadway

reviews.title: Good pizza app
reviews.comment: Ease of use and ordering options, coupons easily used. Full functionality on droid 4. Like the tracker feature.
reviews.author: matthew jacobs

reviews.title: Really good experience!
reviews.comment: I never send in these reviews. However, this app was flawless in every way.  Presentation,  ease of use, payment..... all perfect! You have to tell the big companies when they do good, and Domino\'s did this right! Thanks!
reviews.author: Christopher Gaston

reviews.title: Practically there
reviews.comment: Thrilled to finally have an Android app. Only missing one thing for me: The option to log in to your Shoprunner account for free delivery. Other than that, it is flawless - great job!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good stuff
reviews.comment: After a few uses this app is almost too easy to use. The only complaint is the max$ amount cap on some orders.  If I wanted to call the store I would have
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Second time using the app. First time it let me get all the way through and at the last second said it wasn\'t available! This time worked flawlessly. Great deal so far!
reviews.author: Liam Duggan

reviews.title: Its junk
reviews.comment: Unless your lucky enough to be in a \"delivery zone\" ....I only have 2 domino\'s within 4 miles but \"delivery isn\'t available\" for me... unless I call them, then OH!!! It is. Broken app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Easy to use and understand, ordering pizza online at it\'s finest
reviews.author: DanteInferno87

reviews.title: Still cannot change the sauce away from Robust Inspired
reviews.comment: Whenever I try to change my sauce to Hearty Marinara Sauce, the summary will still say Robust Inspired.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clean, logical, professional.
reviews.comment: Much better than some delivery apps I\'ve used. Gave me prompts that made sense, lots of buttons and very little typing except where necessary. I prefer it to the web version.
reviews.author: Stephen Hepp

reviews.title: One tip for this app
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t allow you to tip using a credit card neither did the receipt so my first driver was out of luck. Add tips and it\'s easily a 5 star application
reviews.author: angellique Clarke
